useCase.name: Nametag Creation for Campers
useCase.description: Create nametags for all campers registered in the system.

mainSequence.step: Camp Management System retrieves all camper profiles.
Camper Profile Database provides camper details to Camp Management System
Camp Management System sends camper details to Nametag Generator
Nametags are generated and sent back to Camp Management System
Camp Management System sends nametags for printing
Camp Management System confirms the successful generation and printing of nametags to Administrator
